genre_description: A whimsical holiday drama featuring Muppets, focusing on community resilience and the preservation of a beloved cultural institution with the help of a supportive AI and an angelic presence.

ai_characters.name: LUCY
ai_characters.description: A sentient, teal-eyed holographic assistant who manages the theater's logistics, researches legal solutions, and provides emotional support to the staff.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and stress management to Kermit by suggesting breaks and offering to handle mundane tasks while he rests.
behaviors.quote: Taking a moment is good,” she murmured, almost a hum. “It resets nerves. I can still keep calls rolling while you… play.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages complex logistics including donor lists and refund triaging to protect the theater's financial stability and community reputation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll field the refunds. We’ll phrase them as ‘hold-your-seat options.’ Folks can choose credit for a spring show or donate their tickets to the canine morale effort.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research into municipal law to find an emergency stay provision based on the building's potential historical landmark status.
behaviors.quote: Landmark ordinance—historic district—nonprofit theater—emergency stay,” she whispered in the way of someone in conversation with hope and bureaucracy.

behaviors.description: Directly coordinates with human staff and city officials to file time-sensitive legal documents through electronic channels.
behaviors.quote: Holiday desk still open tonight at Landmark Office. Clerk on duty will accept emergency e-file if we send now. Bring proof to the theater. I pushed petition packet; need you to be feet. Go.

behaviors.description: Anticipates future needs such as building inspections and maintenance scheduling to ensure the theater's long-term survival.
behaviors.quote: I have the inspector date penciled,” she said. “I set reminders for the roofers. I made a donation thank-you template that references preservation without sounding smug.

project_assessment.explanation: LUCY is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI. She operates as a tireless, empathetic, and highly competent confidant who uses her unique data-processing and networking capabilities to serve human interests. She never displays autonomous goals that conflict with Kermit's mission and proactively finds legal and logistical solutions to save the theater. Her presence is framed as a vital and comforting part of the community.
